JobTitle: Program Lead - Global COE Operations Insights
JobFullDesc: About the Role The Program Manager for Center of Excellence (COE) Operational Insights will own the alignment and standardization of metrics and reporting in our inhouse contact centers. This role will identify gaps in our data foundations, and work closely with Data Infrastructure to provide scalable solutions and robust reporting. This role will also partner closely with our Global COE Lead and product team to implement new tools and features in our support systems, ensure we have monitoring during the implementation and rollout phase, and integrate the new data into our larger reporting environment. What you’ll be doing: Program manage global reporting alignment process by partnering with regional COE program managers and analytics teams to align on current reporting and best practicesWork across teams (WFM, Learning, Quality, COE Leads, etc.) to build synergies in operational reportingPartner with Data Infrastructure team to identify gaps in our data and potential solutionsWork closely with Global COE Lead and Customer Obsession to track and monitor the implementation of new product rolloutsRecommend operational tools & reporting to enable having real time insights and improve operational efficiency and quality Basic Qualifications Minimum 8 years of strategy consulting, program/project management or operations experience  Preferred Qualifications Strong analytical skills including basic knowledge of SQLGlobal or multi-regional stakeholder management experienceExperience in in the inner-workings of a contact centerExperience of working in a high-volume, dynamic and extremely fast-paced environmentData visualizationFamiliarity with data management best practices and working knowledge of SQLExcellent stakeholder managerFlexibility – You have the ability to work with remote teams and across time zones to develop strategies and foster a cohesive and creative work environmentGood communication and organization skills Good understanding Project Management methodologies
